allow to do it the right way.

2606.71.text:
But it's absolutely
in the near future.

2613.21.text:
JULIE GILHART: So, all men
out there, come and see.

2617.84.text:
ALIA RAZA: And then
we can do a video

2619.47.text:
with cute boys
wearing cute clothes.

2624.60.text:
JULIE GILHART: Are
all our dreams.

2627.42.text: So thank you for hosting this.

2634.82.text:
Maybe you'll collaborate
with Google someday.
